title: Early angel investing blind spots, thoughts on the creator economy PLUS Canny.io’s Sarah Hum | E1194
description: Today's show features a throwback format, where Jason answers a fan question about his early blind spots in angel investing (1:54), is joined by Canny.io Founder Sarah Hum (9:08), and then shares his thoughts on the growing "creator economy" (34:22).
